name: Hero
description: Hero sections are used to introduce the product or service. They are the first and primary section of the website.

strings.description: Main title of the hero section
Subtitle of the hero section
Primary button text of the hero section
Secondary button text of the hero section

name: Features
description: Feature are used to highlight the main features of the product or service. This section is a three column grid.

strings.description: Main title of the feature section
Subtitle of the call to feature section
Title of the first feature
Description of the first feature
Button text of the first feature
Title of the second feature
Description of the second feature
Button text of the second feature
Title of the third feature
Description of the third feature
Button text of the third feature

name: Content
description: Content sections are used to provide more detailed information about the product or service. This is a two column content section with an image on the right.

strings.description: A small subtitle that appears on the top of the section, right before the title
Main title of the content section
First paragraph of the content section
Second paragraph of the content section, with larger font size to emphasize the content
Third paragraph of the content section
Fourth paragraph of the content section. It appears on the right side above the image
